short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Highlights all the ads on the Shopee site to easily distinguish between real listing and ads.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Highlights all the ads on the Shopee site to easily distinguish between real listing and ads.

This extension is designed to empower users to make better shopping decisions and have a better experience navigating Shopee's predatory and unethical UI design.
